scripts.web:dev: amplify env checkout dev --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && eas env:pull development --non-interactive && expo start --web
scripts.web:staging: amplify env checkout staging --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && eas env:pull preview --non-interactive && expo start --web
scripts.ios:prod: amplify env checkout prod --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && eas env:pull production --non-interactive && npx expo run ios
scripts.ios:staging: amplify env checkout staging --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && eas env:pull preview --non-interactive && npx expo run ios
scripts.ios:dev: amplify env checkout dev --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && eas env:pull development --non-interactive && npx expo run ios
scripts.android:prod: amplify env checkout prod --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && eas env:pull production && npx expo run android
scripts.android:staging: amplify env checkout staging --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && eas env:pull preview --non-interactive && npx expo run android
scripts.android:dev: amplify env checkout dev --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && eas env:pull development && npx expo run android
scripts.build:ios:prod: amplify env checkout prod --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && npx expo prebuild && eas build -p ios --profile production
scripts.build:android:staging: amplify env checkout staging --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && npx expo prebuild && eas build -p android --profile preview
scripts.build:ios:staging: amplify env checkout staging --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && npx expo prebuild && eas build -p ios --profile preview
scripts.build:android:prod: amplify env checkout prod --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && npx expo prebuild && eas build -p android --profile production
scripts.build:all:prod: amplify env checkout prod --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && npx expo prebuild && eas build -p all --profile production
scripts.web:deploy:staging: amplify env checkout staging --restore && wait-on aws-exports.js && eas env:pull preview --non-interactive && npx expo export --platform web && eas deploy
